snippet: The Cardinals used their trademark gritty defense to advance to the quarterfinals of the Big East tournament, where Louisville will play Marquette, the second seed.
abstract: Louisville defeats Seton Hall, 61-55, in the second round of the men's Big East basketball tournament; South Florida defeats Villanova, 56-47; other results noted.

byline.original: By ZACH SCHONBRUN and PETE THAMEL

lead_paragraph: The Cardinals used their trademark gritty defense to advance to the quarterfinals of the Big East tournament, where Louisville will play Marquette, the second seed.

headline.seo: Loss to Louisville Puts Seton Hall on the Bubble
headline.main: Loss to Louisville Leaves Seton Hall in Jeopardy
headline.print_headline: Loss to Louisville Leaves Seton Hall in Jeopardy
headline.content_kicker: Louisville 61, Seton Hall 55 | South Florida 56, Villanova 47
